name: 應用統計學
restrict: ◎必須先修過【HEU0159  健康促進與衛生教育研究法】
goals: 描述性統計及推論統計的方法與其應用
運用於健康促進與衛生教育的工作之中
認識統計的內含與過程
syllabus:
Prerequisites:  
We encourage you to speak in English in this course. The lecture and discussion will be performed by speaking in English.  
You should have experience with fundamental statistics and research method. 

Course Description:  
According to social and behavioral science research methods increasingly complex and advanced in computer technology in recent years,   
a variety of multivariate statistical method has good application in the analysis of social and behavioral sciences research data.   
This course describes the use of SPSS statistical software and the use of multivariate statistical methods to analyze research data.

Objective:  
This course is designed for students who had completed course of fundamental statistics and research method.   
Content will include concepts of inferential statistics, including t-tests, Chi-square, one-way ANOVA, factorial designs of ANOVA,   
analysis of covariance, linear regressions, factor analysis and SEM.   
Computer software (SPSS) will be employed to assist in the analysis of data for this course.  
This course will be upon understanding statistical concepts, developing skills for carrying out data analyses,interpreting and reporting findings.

Evaluation:  
Assignments 20%  
Midterm exam 30%  
Final exam 30%  
Class discussion involvement 10%  
Attend 10%

  
Week Content:  
1 Introduction of quantitate study  
2 SPSS statistical software practice I  
3 SPSS statistical software practice II  
4 SPSS statistical software practice III  
5 Factorial analysis of variance I  
6 Factorial analysis of variance II  
7 Mid-term Examination  
8 Multiple regression I  
9 Multiple regression II  
10 Item analysis, validity and reliability  
11 Explore factor analysis  
12 Confirmatory factor analysis  
13 Structure equation modeling I  
14 Structure equation modeling II  
15 Structure equation modeling III  
16 Final-term Examination

Textbook and reference:   
Julie Pallant  (2010) SPSS Survival Manual : A step by step guide to data analysis using SPSS ISBN：9780335242399
prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【HEU0159  Research Methods in Health Promotion and Health Ed】
